statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE complaint_flag = TRUE;
SELECT accessory_type, customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE accessory_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND complaint_flag = FALSE;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE complaint_flag = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE accessory_type = 'Headphones' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' AND complaint_flag = FALSE;
SELECT DISTINCT accessory_type FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY accessory_type;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, complaint_flag FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%poor%'
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_complaints WHERE resolution_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT customer_id, complaint_text, complaint_date FROM customer_complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND customer_id = 54321;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE complaint = TRUE;
SELECT accessory_name, price, brand FROM gaming_accessories;
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM gaming_accessories ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, analysis_date FROM feedback_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE complaint = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, accessory_name FROM customer_feedback JOIN gaming_accessories ON customer_feedback.feedback_id = gaming_accessories.accessory_id;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, complaint FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, COUNT(*) FROM feedback_analysis GROUP BY analysis_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, complaint_text, status FROM complaints WHERE status='Open';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, name, price FROM accessories ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE status = 'Open' AND response IS NULL;
SELECT name, price FROM accessories WHERE type = 'Headphones' AND price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT accessory_name, accessory_type, accessory_price FROM Accessories WHERE accessory_price > 50 ORDER BY accessory_price ASC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5;

SELECT feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN Customers ON CustomerFeedback.customer_id = Customers.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' AND feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-30 23:59:59';

SELECT COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback, SUM(IF(positive_sentiment, 1, 0)) AS positive_feedback FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN FeedbackAnalysis ON CustomerFeedback.feedback_id = FeedbackAnalysis.feedback_id;
SELECT accessory_name, accessory_type, accessory_price FROM Accessories WHERE accessory_price > 100 ORDER BY accessory_price DESC;
